prompt:
Nurse: That's great to hear. It's essential to have someone available to pick you up, as you won't be able to drive yourself home after the procedure. Do you have any other questions or concerns about the logistics of your procedure day?

Patient: No. I do not.

Nurse: Alright, that was all the topics for today. Before we wrap up, do you have any other questions or concerns that you'd like to discuss?

Patient: No.

Nurse: Alright, to summarize, we discussed your upcoming colonoscopy on August 13th at 9:00

Patient: I have no questions, no concerns, I'm good to go.

Nurse: AM with I'm glad to hear that you're feeling prepared. To summarize, we discussed your upcoming colonoscopy on August 13th at 9:00 AM with Doctor Meredith Bailey. We went over your diet, medication, and bowel prep instructions. You've confirmed that you've arranged a ride home after the procedure. Does that sound right?

Patient: Yes.

responses.gpt4: Great. I just want to remind you that I'm here for you every step of the way. I will call you again the day before the procedure to go over step by step all the prep instructions. If you need to contact us in the meantime, the callback number is 641-381-6523. Do you have any other questions or concerns before we end the call?
responses.our_model: Great, I'm glad we're on the same page. Remember, I'm here for you every step of the way. I will call you again the day before the procedure to go over step by step all the prep instructions. If you have any questions or concerns in the meantime, you can reach us at 641-381-6523. Does that sound good to you?
